thread.title: no boasting, this place it full on service
thread.title_full: no boasting, this place it full on service - Review of Coopmanhuijs Boutique Hotel & Spa, Stellenbosch, South Africa - TripAdvisor

author: andrewcrosby
title: no boasting, this place it full on service
text: charming and comfortable, but what makes this place tick is seamless service that is never overbearing or in your face. Never missed a beat. Go and be surprised. An example: my bag left in the bar at night: they didn't wake me up, they had the presence of mind to label it Room 11 and leave it at the desk. Someone is always thinking in this place.
